title: Johnson City 2001
text: Johnson City 2001 is a complete concert album by <a href="Widespread%20Panic">Widespread Panic</a>. The three disc set is the fifth release from the Widespread Panic archives. The performance was recorded live at <a href="Freedom%20Hall%20Civic%20Center">Freedom Hall Civic Center</a> in <a href="Johnson%20City%2C%20Tennessee">Johnson City, Tennessee</a> on November 20, 2001. The multi-track recording featured all original band members including the late guitarist, <a href="Michael%20Houser">Michael Houser</a>.
